author: Source: Worcester Telegram & Gazette
title: Cee Lo Green Engaged to Longtime Girlfriend Shani James - Worcester Telegram & Gazette
text:
The former Voice coach proposed to James nearly a year ago at the studio where he was recording his upcoming album Heart Blanche. "I went and purchased a ring that we had seen together, maybe four or five months or so prior," Green told the magazine.
 Worcester Telegram & Gazette.
